responses: Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: What are the majors in CSE
responses: There are 3 majors: Computer Science(CS), Data Science(DS) and Intelligent Technology(IT), with IT has 2 sub-majors which are Computer Engineering(CE) and Network Engineering(NE)
For classroom that have A.___, it would be at the main campus, for L___, it would be at the Library

patterns: Which sports does the university have?
responses: In IU, there are: Martial, Swimming, Table Tennis and Chess
